name: Bat of Justice
description:
The "Bat of Justice" of the sorcerers baseball team is broken and splitted into three parts - of course these parts will be guarded by some monsters. It's up to you, a little sorcerer, to get all three parts back again!

This game was made for ZFXAction06 during one weekend.

Controls
WASD = Movement
Space = Activate destruction spell near a bat part
G = Distance spell (pushes enemies in range away)
